item.title: Modern Warfare 2
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Elijah, post:110, topic:313873”][quote author=the bank link=topic=410365.msg3141485#msg3141485 date=1267577459]

I still think its good. I don’t play it expecting it to be AMAZINGLY realistic, hell I play Hardcore. But I still get enjoyment and entertainment out of the game.

I only play hardcore. But i hate how they completely defeat the point of primary weapons when an idiot runs around with a side arm and gets so many killstreaks.
[/quote]Well in CoD4 they had the perk that let you carry two primary weapons, I always just think of that.

And besides, if I get downed by one then I just remember that he should have been just as easy to kill as any other player and that I must have done something wrong myself.

The game mode I prefer, HC S&D, is really like a big game of chess and to die you have to move your piece to the wrong spot at the wrong time, too early in the game usually.

It really is interesting when you look at it from a perspective outside of just shooting people. It has increased my game 10 fold.

Thank you, I’m not the only one with this play style. Do you try to flank your opponents as well?[/quote]Yes, as much as possible. Most of my friends are on PSN so I am stuck seeing where my team mates are going and hoping they’re smart enough to see the maneuver I am doing. Nothing like shooting a guy too distracted by the rest of your team

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:107, topic:313873”][quote author=Frell link=topic=410365.msg3141451#msg3141451 date=1267573878]

I still think its good. I don’t play it expecting it to be AMAZINGLY realistic, hell I play Hardcore. But I still get enjoyment and entertainment out of the game.

I only play hardcore. But i hate how they completely defeat the point of primary weapons when an idiot runs around with a side arm and gets so many killstreaks.
[/quote]Well in CoD4 they had the perk that let you carry two primary weapons, I always just think of that.

And besides, if I get downed by one then I just remember that he should have been just as easy to kill as any other player and that I must have done something wrong myself.

The game mode I prefer, HC S&D, is really like a big game of chess and to die you have to move your piece to the wrong spot at the wrong time, too early in the game usually.

It really is interesting when you look at it from a perspective outside of just shooting people. It has increased my game 10 fold.[/quote]

Thank you, I’m not the only one with this play style. Do you try to flank your opponents as well?

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:108, topic:313873”][quote author=the bank link=topic=410365.msg3141485#msg3141485 date=1267577459]

I still think its good. I don’t play it expecting it to be AMAZINGLY realistic, hell I play Hardcore. But I still get enjoyment and entertainment out of the game.

I only play hardcore. But i hate how they completely defeat the point of primary weapons when an idiot runs around with a side arm and gets so many killstreaks.
[/quote]Well in CoD4 they had the perk that let you carry two primary weapons, I always just think of that.

And besides, if I get downed by one then I just remember that he should have been just as easy to kill as any other player and that I must have done something wrong myself.

The game mode I prefer, HC S&D, is really like a big game of chess and to die you have to move your piece to the wrong spot at the wrong time, too early in the game usually.

It really is interesting when you look at it from a perspective outside of just shooting people. It has increased my game 10 fold.

Theres been times when ill get mad and just camp and look at a spot for about 5 minutes, then when i run in the other direction through a doorway someone comes from that area and shoots me in the back.

Or you’ll spawn and get hit by someone spraying down the middle of the map.

My philosophy: When you camp you get no kills but when someone else camps you get killed.[/quote]
ur doing it wrong. I used to rack up kills camping on ambush on cod4

Read full topic

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:107, topic:313873”][quote author=Frell link=topic=410365.msg3141451#msg3141451 date=1267573878]

I still think its good. I don’t play it expecting it to be AMAZINGLY realistic, hell I play Hardcore. But I still get enjoyment and entertainment out of the game.

I only play hardcore. But i hate how they completely defeat the point of primary weapons when an idiot runs around with a side arm and gets so many killstreaks.
[/quote]Well in CoD4 they had the perk that let you carry two primary weapons, I always just think of that.

And besides, if I get downed by one then I just remember that he should have been just as easy to kill as any other player and that I must have done something wrong myself.

The game mode I prefer, HC S&D, is really like a big game of chess and to die you have to move your piece to the wrong spot at the wrong time, too early in the game usually.

It really is interesting when you look at it from a perspective outside of just shooting people. It has increased my game 10 fold.[/quote]
Theres been times when ill get mad and just camp and look at a spot for about 5 minutes, then when i run in the other direction through a doorway someone comes from that area and shoots me in the back.

Or you’ll spawn and get hit by someone spraying down the middle of the map.

My philosophy: When you camp you get no kills but when someone else camps you get killed.

Read full topic

[/quote]
I only play hardcore. But i hate how they completely defeat the point of primary weapons when an idiot runs around with a side arm and gets so many killstreaks.[/quote]Well in CoD4 they had the perk that let you carry two primary weapons, I always just think of that.

And besides, if I get downed by one then I just remember that he should have been just as easy to kill as any other player and that I must have done something wrong myself.

The game mode I prefer, HC S&D, is really like a big game of chess and to die you have to move your piece to the wrong spot at the wrong time, too early in the game usually.

It really is interesting when you look at it from a perspective outside of just shooting people. It has increased my game 10 fold.
